name: uvtxssvtx

body.origin:
|- wss(cfv(cuvtx, c0), c1)
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuvtx, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
-| diffsc(hs0, cfv(cuvtx, c0))
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)
body.pretty:
⊢ (UnivVtx ` c0)⊆ c1
⊣ (hs0 ∈(UnivVtx ` c0)→ hs0 ∈ c1)
⊣ d(hs0,(UnivVtx ` c0))
⊣ d(hs0, c1)

-| diffsc(hs0, cfv(cuvtx, c0))
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (UnivVtx ` c0)⊆ c1
⊣ (hs0 ∈(UnivVtx ` c0)→ hs0 ∈ c1)
⊣ d(hs0,(UnivVtx ` c0))
⊣ d(hs0, c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuvtx, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cvtx, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(cfv(cuvtx, c0), c1)
-| diffsc(hs0, cfv(cuvtx, c0))
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)

⊣ d(hs0, c1)
⊣ c1 =(Vtx ` c0)

|- wss(cfv(cuvtx, c0), c1)
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cvtx, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (UnivVtx ` c0)⊆ c1
⊣ d(hs0, c1)

comment: The set of the universal vertices is a subset of the set of all vertices. (Contributed by AV, 23-Dec-2020.)
